attributes.additional_details: There has been a tremendous amount of speculation  around this topic from epic story regarding crashed alien crafts in Roswell USA in 1947 to numerous reports of sightings throughout the world not to mention alien stories of abductions etc. Over the last 15 / 20 years there has been an increasing public interest in full disclosure of the fact that not only the government know of the existence of so called aliens but have know for some time
